contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|bang|bangs}} '''Bang''' or '''bangs''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == * [[Bang (surname)]] * [[Bangs (surname)]] * Bang, pseudonym of [[Barbro Alving]] (born 1909), Swedish journalist * [[Bangs (hip hop artist)]], a South Sudanese-Australian hip hop artist ==Groups== * [[Bang (band)]], a Greek pop music group * [[Bang (American band)]], a hard rock group * [[Bang (UK pop band)]] * [[Bang! (band)]], a British happy hardcore group * [[Bangs (band)]], an American punk rock group ==Arts and media== ===Albums and EPs=== * [[Bang! (After School EP)|''Bang!'' (After School EP)]] * [[BANG! (Cinema Bizarre album)|''BANG!'' (Cinema Bizarre album)]] * [[Bang! (1985 Frankie Goes to Hollywood album)|''Bang!'' (1985 Frankie Goes to Hollywood album)]] * ''[[Bang!... The Greatest Hits of Frankie Goes to Hollywood]]'' * [[Bang! (EP)|''Bang!'' (EP)]], by the Goo Goo Dolls * [[Bang! (Corey Hart album)|''Bang!'' (Corey Hart album)]] * [[Bang (James Gang album)|''Bang'' (James Gang album)]] * [[Bang (The Jesus Lizard album)|''Bang'' (The Jesus Lizard album)]] * [[Bang (EP)|''Bang'' (EP)]], by Nightmare of You * [[Bang (Rockapella album)|''Bang'' (Rockapella album)]] * [[Bang! (Thunder album)|''Bang!'' (Thunder album)]] * [[Bang! (World Party album)|''Bang!'' (World Party album)]] ===Songs=== * [[Bang (song)|"Bang" (song)]], by Blur * "Bang", a song by Gorky Park on the album ''[[Gorky Park (album)|Gorky Park]]'' * [[Bang (Rye Rye song)|"Bang" (Rye Rye song)]], by Rye Rye featuring M.I.A. on the albums ''Fast & Furious'' and ''Go! Pop! Bang!'' * "Bangs", a song by They Might Be Giants on the album ''[[Mink Car]]'' * "Bang", a song by Waka Flocka Flame featuring YG Hootie & Slim Dunkin on the album ''[[Flockaveli]]'' * "Bang", a song by Dave Dee, Dozy, Beaky, Mick & Tich from the album ''[[If Music Be the Food of Love... Then Prepare for Indigestion]]'' ===Film and television=== * [[Bang (film)|''Bang'' (film)]], a 1997 American film * [[Bang! (film)|''Bang!'' (film)]], a 1977 Swedish film * [[Bang (Desperate Housewives)|"Bang" (''Desperate Housewives'')]] * [[Bang (The Good Wife)|"Bang" (''The Good Wife'')]] * [[Bang (Harper's Island)|"Bang" (''Harper's Island'')]] * [[Bang (The Shield)|"Bang" (''The Shield'')]] * "Bangs", an [[List of The Protector episodes|episode of "The Protector"]] ===Media companies=== * [[Bang Records]], a record label * [[Bang (company)]], a music and sound production company from NYC ===Other arts and media=== * ''Bang!'', a 2005 young adult novel by [[Sharon G. Flake]] * [[Bang (magazine)|''Bang'' (magazine)]] * [[Bang! (opera)|''Bang!'' (opera)]], by John Rutter * [[Bang Cartoon]], a website ==Games== * ''[[Bang!]]'', a card game * [[Bang! (arcade game)]] * [[Bang! (drama game)]], a game involving imaginary guns * [[Bang! (video game)|''Bang!'' (video game)]] * Bang Shishigami, a [[List of BlazBlue characters|''BlazBlue'' character]] ==Geography== * [[Bang, Bushehr]], a village in Iran * [[Bang, Lorestan]], a village in Iran * [[Bangs, Texas]] *[[John and Lavina Bangs House]], listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Henry County, Iowa ==Other uses== * [[Bangs (hair)]], hair in front of the forehead * [[Bang (Korean)]], a room or building * [[!Bang!]], a professional wrestling promotion * [[Bang's disease]] * [[BANG file]], a point access method * [[Bang path]], a type of e-mail address * [[Exclamation mark]] (!), a punctuation symbol * Bang, a [[List of model car brands|model car brand]] * [[Bay Area News Group]], the largest newspaper publisher in the San Francisco Bay Area ==See also== * [[Banging (disambiguation)]] * [[Bhang]] * [[Bang Bang (disambiguation)]] * [[Big Bang (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
